results.content: Overall, great course for someone who doesn't know anything about HTML, CSS or JavaScript.  There were some topics that were covered a little extensively in their own video that could have been condensed.  Instructor should point out that some things on the screen you see are for later courses.  Thank you for providing this excellent free video and speaking very clearly.

results.content: Very slowly paced course. Still, what is shown is sloppy and incomplete.  What can easily be taught  in a minute takes 10 minutes. Poor examples that often does not show what is intended. A complete beginner that will follow up with more beginner courses can still have some benefit from it.
